Ljubljančan preprodajal drogo in grozil domačinoma
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Sijan Pretnar

Postojnski policisti in koprski kriminalisti so že pred prazniki nataknili lisice 27-letnemu Ljubljančanu. Mlajšega domačina je izsiljeval, drugega je udaril in poškodoval, pri hišni preiskavi njegovega občasnega postojnskega domovanja pa so zasegli kilogram heroina in več kilogramov snovi, s katerimi bi povečal količino prepovedane droge, namenjene preprodaji.



Pri aretaciji je imel 27-letnik za pasom pištolo beretta.  Foto: PU Koper

POSTOJNA > Pred dobrim tednom so postojnski policisti in koprski kriminalisti v Pivki v bližini tamkajšnje metadonske ambulante aretirali 27-letnega Ljubljančana, ki občasno živi v Postojni. Pri aretaciji so sodelovali tudi kriminalisti, saj so na podlagi že zbranih informacij sklepali, da je osumljeni verjetno oborožen. V začetku oktobra je namreč grozil Postojnčanoma, grožnje pa podkrepil z nožem in pištolo.
Pri aretaciji je imel za pasom pištolo beretta
Sumi, da imajo opravka z nevarnim osumljenim, so se potrdili. Med prijetjem je imel za pasom pištolo znamke beretta s polnim nabojnikom.
40.000 evrov je po ocenah policistov vredna droga, ki so jo zasegli med hišno preiskavo
Policisti in kriminalisti so začeli ravnanje 27-letnika preiskovati, po tem ko so v začetku oktobra dobili prijavi dveh domačinov, ki so jih nato preverili še z operativnim delom na terenu. 27-letnika iz Ljubljane so postojnski policisti utemeljeno osumili storitve kaznivih dejanj izsiljevanja. Mlajšega moškega iz Postojne je izsiljeval za manjši, domnevno namišljen denarni dolg. Ta naj bi izviral iz poslov s prepovedanimi substancami. Da bi dosegel svoje, je Postojnčanu tudi grozil in omenjal orožje.
Zaradi vode je udaril upravnika bloka
Ljubljančan je osumljen tudi kaznivega dejanja lahke telesne poškodbe. Drugega moškega, upravnika enega od postojnskih blokov, v katerem je osumljeni stanoval s partnerko, je pred časom s pestjo udaril v obraz in mu poškodoval ličnico. Do hudih besed je prišlo, ker je v stanovanju, kjer je osumljeni živel s partnerko, prišlo do izliva vode, ta pa je nato tekla v druge prostore.
Policisti in kriminalisti so po aretaciji osumljenega z odredbo koprskega okrožnega sodišča že v Pivki najprej preiskali avto osumljenega. Po naših podatkih gre za vozilo višjega cenovnega razreda, nato pa so opravili še hišno preiskavo stanovanja, v katerem je občasno živel.
V stanovanju našli skoraj kilogram heroina, več denarja ...
Poleg pištole, za katero ni imel dovoljenja, so zasegli tudi nož, s katerim je osumljeni podkrepil grožnje. V stanovanju pa so odkrili večjo količino prepovedane droge, skoraj kilogram heroina in še približno 3,5 kilograma prašnate snovi. Sumijo, da gre za snov, s katero bi povečal količino prepovedane droge.
Zasegli so še več denarja in razne pripomočke, namenjene pakiranju in razpečevanju prepovedane droge. Iz stanovanja so odnesli več elektronskih tehtnic, ročno kovinsko stiskalnico s kalupi in drugo. Na koprski policijski upravi ocenjujejo, da je zaseženi heroin vreden približno 40.000 evrov.
Osumljenega Ljubljančana so pridržali, pred prazniki pa z ovadbo zaradi neupravičene proizvodnje in prometa s prepovedanimi drogami, izsiljevanja in lahke telesne poškodbe odpeljali na zaslišanje k preiskovalnemu sodniku koprskega okrožnega sodišča. Po zaslišanju je državna tožilka za osumljenega predlagala pripor, s čimer se je strinjal tudi preiskovalni sodnik. Od minule srede je 27-letnik tako za zapahi koprskega zapora.
S koprske policijske uprave so sporočili, da so Ljubljančana možje postave v preteklosti že obravnavali zaradi premoženjskih kaznivih dejanj in nasilja, zaradi česar so ga na sodišču pravnomočno obsodili, med drugim tudi zaradi napada na uradno osebo, ki je opravljala naloge varnosti.
Pred kratkim je v pripor končal še en preprodajalec
Policisti in kriminalisti na Postojnskem vlagajo veliko naporov v preprečevanje kaznivih dejanj s področja organizirane kriminalitete, poudarjajo na koprski upravi. “To je naša naloga, občani to od nas pričakujejo,” je poudaril Miran Korošec, pomočnik komandirja na postojnski policijski postaji, odgovoren za področje kriminalitete, javnega reda in splošnih policijskih nalog. Za občane je najbolj moteča ulična preprodaja prepovedanih drog, ki se dogaja v urbanih naseljih, blokih ... Korošec ugotavlja, da je problematika v letošnjem letu na približno enaki ravni kot lani. Vsako leto obravnavajo pet do sedem takšnih primerov. Pred nekaj tedni so prijeli še enega preprodajalca, za katerega je sodišče odredilo pripor.
Policisti se zahvaljujejo občanov, ki jim, četudi anonimno, sporočajo, če se v njihovi okolici dogaja kaj sumljivega. “Če kaj takega opazijo, jih prosimo, da to sporočijo na anonimni telefon policije. Vsa sporočila preverimo in so lahko podlaga na nadaljnje ukrepanje,” je še dodal Korošec.



Med hišno preiskavo pri Ljubljančanu so policisti in kriminalisti zasegli kilogram heroina in še 3,5 kilograma snovi, domnevno namenjene povečevanju volumna prepovedane droge. Foto: PU Koper



Med hišno preiskavo so našli tudi stiskalnico in druge pripomočke za pakiranje prepovedane droge. Foto: PU koper

A drug dealer from Ljubljana and threatening the locals
07 Nov 2019, 06:00 by Sijan Pretnar

Postojna police officers and Koper criminals handcuffed the 27-year-old Ljubljana man before the holidays. He blackmailed the younger native, struck and injured another and seized a kilogram of heroin and several kilograms of substances to increase the amount of illicit drugs for sale during a house search of his occasional Postojna home.



At arrest, the 27-year-old had a beret gun behind his waist. Photo: PU Koper

POSTOJNA> A week ago, a police officer and a Koper criminal in Pivka arrested a 27-year-old Ljubljana resident from Postojna near a methadone ambulance station there. Criminal investigators also took part in the arrest, on the basis of the information already gathered that the suspect was probably armed. In the beginning of October, he threatened Postojncani, and backed up the threats with a knife and a gun.
At the time of his arrest, he had a beret gun behind his belt
Suspects of dealing with a dangerous suspect have been confirmed. During his arrest, he had a full-loaded beretta pistol behind his belt.
According to police officers, € 40,000 is a worth of drug seized during a house search
Police officers and criminals have begun investigating the behavior of the 27-year-old, after receiving reports from two locals in early October, which they then checked with operational work in the field. A 27-year-old from Ljubljana has been suspected of extortion by a police officer in Postojna. He blackmailed a younger man from Postojna for a smaller, allegedly imaginary monetary debt. This allegedly originated in illicit substance transactions. In order to reach his own, he also threatened Postojna and mentioned the weapon.
He hit the block manager because of the water
The Ljubljana man is also suspected of the crime of slight bodily harm. Another man, the manager of one of the Postojna blocks in which the suspect was staying with a partner, struck his face with a fist and injured his cheek. The harsh words came because in the apartment where the suspect lived with his partner, there was an outflow of water, which then flowed into other rooms.
Following the arrest of the suspect by the order of the Koper District Court, police officers and criminals first searched the suspect's car in Pivka. According to our data, it is a higher-end vehicle, and then they carried out a house search of the apartment in which he occasionally lived.
Almost a pound of heroin found in the apartment, more money ...
In addition to the pistol he was not licensed for, they also seized a knife, with which the suspect backed up the threats. A large amount of illicit drugs, nearly one kilogram of heroin and another 3.5 kilograms of dusty substance were discovered in the apartment. They suspect it is a substance that would increase the amount of illicit drugs.
They seized even more money and various gadgets to pack and distribute illicit drugs. Several electronic scales were taken from the apartment, a hand-held metal press with molds and more. The Koper Police Directorate estimates that the seized heroin is worth about 40,000 euros.
The suspect was detained and sent to the investigating judge of the Koper District Court for questioning before the holidays on charges of unlawful production and trafficking of drugs, extortion and minor bodily harm. After the hearing, the State's Attorney proposed detention for the suspect, which was also agreed by the investigating judge. As of last Wednesday, the 27-year-old is behind the locks of the Koper prison.
The Koper Police Directorate said that the men of Ljubljana had already been treated in the past for property crimes and violence, which led to its conviction in court, including for assaulting a security officer.
Recently, another reseller was put in custody
Police officers and criminals in Postojna are making a lot of efforts to prevent organized crime, stressed the administration of Koper. "This is our job, the citizens expect it from us," said Miran Korošec, assistant commander at the police station in Postojna, responsible for crime, public order and general police tasks. For citizens, the most disturbing street drug trafficking is happening in urban areas, blocks ... Korošec notes that this year the problem is at about the same level as last year. Five to seven such cases are handled annually. A few weeks ago, they apprehended another dealer who was remanded in custody by the court.
Police officers thank the residents for letting them know, even if anonymously, if anything suspicious is happening in their area. "If they notice anything like this, please report it to the anonymous telephone number of the police. All messages are verified and can be the basis for further action, ”Korošec added.
